main

Class SLChat

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.SLChat

  • public class SLChat
extends java.lang.Object
    Main entrance to the whole program.

    This static class Starts the main GUI window and also guides program workflow, serving as intermedium between other objects in program. Contains methods for getting service information (getRooms() for example).

    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Andrey Fadeev

      • duplicatePrintStream

        private static java.io.PrintStream duplicatePrintStream(java.io.PrintStream realPrintStream,
                                                        java.io.PrintStream newOutputStream)
        Intercepts given output stream (realPrintStream), prints message to it and duplicates to given PrintStream (newOutputStream).
        Parameters:
        realPrintStream - PrintStram to catch messages.
        newOutputStream - PrintStrim to duplicate messages.
        Returns:
        new PrintStream, which prints messages to both streams.

      • makeFileOutput

        private static java.io.PrintStream makeFileOutput(java.lang.String folderPath,
                                                  java.lang.String fileName,
                                                  java.lang.String encoding)
                                           throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                  java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Opens new PrintStream at FileOutputStream with given file path.
        Parameters:
        folderPath - a path to folder, where file resides.
        fileName - a name of output file.
        encoding - encoding, at which to save a stream of symbols.
        Returns:
        opened PrintStream to file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - not checked yet.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when given encoding is not suppoerted by system.

      • makeFolder

        private static java.lang.String makeFolder(java.lang.String folderName)
        Creates folder for program.

        Creates folder by given name in folder, named "SLChat", which is located in user's home folder.

        Parameters:
        folderName - Folder name to create.
        Returns:
        Full path to the folder, in correct system style, even if folder wasn't creates because it is already exists.

      • catchSOut

        private static void catchSOut(java.lang.String encoding)
                       throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                              java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        Catches default systems output streams and duplicates them to output files.
        Parameters:
        encoding - encoding in which to save output.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - when cannot assign file output in supplementary method.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - when system does not support used encoding.
        See Also:
        makeFileOutput(String, String, String), duplicatePrintStream(PrintStream, PrintStream)

      • isCharsetPresent

        private static boolean isCharsetPresent(java.lang.String charsetName)
        Determines, whether system supports charset, given by charsetName parameter.
        Parameters:
        charsetName - a charset to be found.
        Returns:
        true, if given charset is supported by a system.
